Orlando.Court of Flags Resort:
The Court of Flags Resort was a resort located in Orlando, Florida, USA.


== History ==
The resort was built by US Steel in 1972 and opened in 1974. It was a popular upscale resort when it opened, and later in its life it become more of a budget resort. In 2006, it was demolished to make room for the new Citymark of Orlando; this never materialized.
